posts.post_content:
$55.00 delivered. Check or money order only. No electronic payments. Sales tax applies if delivery is in New York. Please use email: [url]edhans@monkberry.com[/url] for all communication as my PM inbox tends to get full. As always, "I'll take it" takes precedence over ongoing negotiations, requests for additional pictures, etc. Offering 10% (included in above price) off all cards on my updated website this month. Thank you for your consideration. 

[IMG]http://www.monkberry.com/~edhans/t201lap154.jpg[/IMG]
